title: I Have Been With Both Of Them
itunes:title: I Have Been With Both Of Them
description:
Dear Steve and Shirley, I was married for 17 years and I've been divorced for six years. After my divorce, I was buckwild for a little bit dating many different women at one time. One of the girls I dated was a sweet church girl and we shared many intimate adult moments. She was a wonderful girl, but I didn't want to settle down so she stopped fooling with me. A year later I saw a picture of her younger sister on facebook and she was incredible. So I decided to reach out to the sister......

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
